Natural.name: Calculate auto premium-no style
Natural.Dsl:
when r1 and r2 and r3 and r4 and r5 and r6 and r7 and r8 and r9 and r10 and r11 and r12 end
when r1 then car.Style = 0 end
when r2 car.Style == 'Compact' then increase premium by (250) amount end
when r3 car.Style == 'Sedan' then increase premium by (400) amount end
when r4 car.Style == 'Luxury' then increase premium by (500) amount end
when r5 car is not new and car.Age<6 then increase premium by (400) amount end
when r6 car is not new and car.Age<5 then increase premium by (300) amount end
when r7 car is not new and car.Price is [5; 10] then increase premium by (250) amount end
when car is not new
is car new == false
end
when is car new (car.ModelYear == DateTime.Today.Year) or (car.ModelYear == (DateTime.Today.Year+1)) end
when r8 car.UninsuredMotoristCoverage then increase premium by (300) amount end
when r9 car.HasMedicalCoverage then increase premium by (600) amount end
when r10 car.OccupantInjuryCategory == 'ExtremelyHigh' then increase premium by (1000) amount end
when r11 car.OccupantInjuryCategory == 'High' then increase premium by (500) amount end
when r12 car.TheftCategory == 'High' then increase premium by (500) amount end
when increase premium by {n} amount then car.AutoPremium += n; end
